video_title: Can you have 10,000 dinners with someone? #jayshetty #relationshipadvice #marriageadvice
transcript:
Aisha Vegs one of the UK's most famous
divorce lawyers and she was asking you
know look you've seen so many
relationships fall apart can you share
what makes a great relationship number
one she said separate bedrooms and
number two she said 10,000 dinners if
you can see yourself having 10,000
dinners with someone because looks and
Fades lust might dissolve but if you can
see yourself having 10,000 dinners with
someone hold them close because great
love is hard to find
